subject: Re: [junit] How to test main() method ??
msgSnippet: ... What makes testing main() different from testing other methods? -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com 2005
messageBody:
xll_ll_ll_ll_ll_llx wrote:
> I need info on how to go about testing the main() method. Should it
> really be tested? If yes, what are the various ways in which this can
> be done?
> Where can I find more resources (preferrably online) on this issue?

What makes testing main() different from testing other methods?
